metadata.Title: CVE-2023-38802 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: FRRouting FRR 7.5.1 through 9.0 and Pica8 PICOS 4.3.3.2 allow a remote attacker to cause a denial of service via a crafted BGP update with a corrupted attribute 23 (Tunnel Encapsulation).

notes.Note: sbeattie> VINCE #1159 eslerm> frr merged patch on 2023-08-29 bcb6b58d9 ("bgpd: Use treat-as-withdraw for tunnel encapsulation attribute") quagga does not implement RFC 7606 mdeslaur> This was actually fixed in USN-6323-1, but was not listed because of a copy/paste error

criterions.comment: quagga: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
